question:
Consider the following technologies which were recently in news:
  1. Varunastra Torpedo
  2. Light Combat Aircraft (LCA) Tejas
  3. Long Range Surface to Air Missile (LR-SAM)
Which of the above has/have been developed by Defence Research and Development Organisation (DRDO)?
explanation: India's Light Combat Aircraft (LCA) Tejas is the smallest and lightest Multi-Role Supersonic Fighter Aircraft of its class. LR-SAM is an Indian-Israeli surface-to-air missile (SAM). The Varunastra is an Indian advanced heavyweight anti-submarine torpedo, developed by Naval Science and Technological Laboratory of the DRDO.
